si. sa. siksikka, siksikkan, siniksik, inosiksikken, to button tight, also summiksik. Pasiksik, trańs.**iksik, a buttoning, Ma-asasiksik, one who buttons.

zh-def: 提醒過去的承諾或債務
ori-def: si. sa. soalla, soûllen, sinoal, *nosoallen, to remind of an old promise or debt. Pasoal, trans.
sinûmmoûsoap, sasûm*oûsoap, soasoûppa, soa-asappen, si*oasoap, inosoasoàp, to do anything blindly and by feeling.

zh-def: 用鋤頭拔除田裡的雜草
ori-def: sinûmmoat, sasûmmoat, soût-*a, soûtten, sinoat, insoatten, to pull up and remove the weeds with which the *ice fields are covered by means of a *ook or hoe. Pasoat, pinasoat, papaso*t, ipûsoat, inipasoat, inoipà-oat, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 將繩子或藤的兩端連結在一起以延長
ori-def: si. sa. imp. sógoa, to bind two ends, as of string, rattan, &c. one over the other and thus to lengthen. Paso-*go, trans.

zh-def: 推開，或是督促人們或促使他們去做自己有意願的事情
ori-def: sinummokar, sasummokar, *let the o be scarcely heard) isokarra, *sokar, inisokar, inoisokar, to push away from one. Also to drive on people and urge them to do that which they are disposed to. Summaloso, si. sa. salosoa, salosoan, sinalósoan, ino*alosoan, to drive on and urge. Pasa*o*o, &c. Summekar o chan, to stir up the fire. Pasokar, pinasokar, papasokar, ipûsokarra, ipasokar, inipasokar, inoipasokar, to cause such to be done.
sinûmmoes, sasûmmoes, to grow, to increase, to become great. Pasoes, pinasoes, papasoes, ipasoesa, ipasoes, inipasoes, to cause to grow.
sinûmmokad, sasummokad, sokadda, sokadden, sinokad, inosokadden, to push or kick with the foot. Pasokad, pinasokad, papasokad, ipasokadda, &c. to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 用棍子、撥火棍、劍去推或插某物，或用手指指
ori-def: sinummokko, sasummokko, sokkoa, sokkoon, sinokko, inosokkoon, to push or thrust any one with a stick, poker, sword, &c. also to point with the finger. Pasokko, pi. pa. ipasokkoa, ipasokko, &c. to cause to be pushed.
sinummook, sasummook, soka, soken, sinook, inosoken, to kick with the foot behind. Pasook, pi. pa. ipûsoka, &c to cause such to be done.

sinûmmokkosokko, sasummokkosokko, sokkosokkoa, sokkosokkoon, sinokkosokkoon, inosokko-sokkoon, to push frequently as above, summokkosokko no zido, to churn. Pasokkosokko, inipasokkosokko, inoipasokkosokko, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 當雲團密布，越過丘陵，東部雷雨交加時。頻繁發生在東南季風時的傍晚
ori-def: sinûmmoloch, sasummoloch, the threatening, drawing together of the clouds, over the hills, when the eastern quarter is set in for rain and thunder, as frequently in the southeast monsoon, takes place towards evening. Pûsoloch, pinûsoloch, papûsoloch, ipa-solocha, ipasoloch, to occasion such.
sinûmmóoso, sasummooso, soossoa, sóossoon, sinosso, inosoossoon, to follow up, to trace. Pû-oosso, pinasoosso, papûsoosso, ipasoossoa, ipasoosso, to cause to be followed up.

zh-def: 反對；做任何相反的事情
ori-def: sinummopat, sasummopat, sopatta, sopatten, sinopat, inosopatten, to be over against, to do anything in opposition. Pasopat, pinasopat, papû-sopat, &c. to cause such to be done. Sasopat over againt: this word is joined with karri and mau, as (karri-sasopat) and means to be over against each other: thus karrisasopat patodon, to live opposite to each other. Summapat o meroos, o pattite, to sit or speak one over against the other.
sinummopisop, sasummopisop, sopisoppa, sopisoppen, sinópisop, to stroke or smooth with the hand, also to level, see Masopisóp. Pasopisop, pi. pa. ipûsopisop, in ipûsopisop, to cause to be stroked.

zh-def: 就像在田間砍掉稻穀一樣
ori-def: si. sa. suppoa, to put up in heaps, as is done with the paddy after it is cut down in the field. Pasuppo, to cause such to be done. Suppo, a heap of corn, such as is seen in the fields, in the time of harvest.
sinûmmoso, sasùmmoso, sosoa, sosoon, sinoso, to roast. Pasoso, pi. pa. ipasosoa, to cause to be roasted. Sasoan and sasosoaijan, a roaster or spit with which people roast.

sinummosa, sasummosa, sósasosanni and sosaijan, inososanni and sinososaijan, inososanni and inososaijan, inososanni and inososaijan, to dwell, to inhabit. Pasosa, pi. pa. ipasosa, &c. to cause to inhabit.
sinummas, sasummas, s***, sassan, sinas, inosassan, to put food to settle, as people do in a skimming dish. Pasas, pinasas, papasas, ipasassa, &c. to cause to settle.

zh-def: 用手、火槍、箭，或劍指向前方
ori-def: sinummot, sasummot, sotta, sotten, sinot, inosotten, to point towards, either with the finger, or musket, arrow, sword, &c. Pasot, pinasot, papasot, &c. to cause such to be done.
sinûmpo, sasumpo, suppoa, suppoan, sienpon, inosuppoan, to help, to lend a hand in any work, as Molliol. Pasuppo, pi. pa. ipasuppoa, ipasûppo, &c. to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 男性專有名詞前方的前綴虛詞
ori-def: a particle prefixed to all proper names of men, as Ta Cabba, Ta Bai, &c.

zh-def: 領土、土地或住所；普通道路或街道、地面。
ori-def: territory, land or dwelling place; the common road or street, the ground.
a half moon.

zh-def: 一個抓野生動物的陷阱
ori-def: a snare, for catching wild beasts.

zh-def: 乞求；沒有羞恥地要求任何事情
ori-def: tsi. tat. imp. taamen o rapisa, pas. taamen o rapies, tsinaamen o rapies, inotaamen o rapies, to beg, to demand anything without shame, nom. Ma-ataamen o rapies a beggar.
a native chopper. Fr. tummabba.
full grown, adult.
a family sprung from one stock, relations.
a bag-pipe, or trumpet.

zh-def: 下雨時沒有積水的地方
ori-def: a place where no water settles, when it rains. Matabtab, the verb.
a large gourd.
moisture, sap. From Matach.
shrimps that are taken in fresh water; also teor, a large kind; rauno, a small kind of shrimps, which are found in salt water, Aûan, very small shrimps.
heat. From Matadach.
an instrument with which people pull down earth
a sole, a sort of fish
a head band, such as the women wear.
a lock. From dûmmarri.
the upper part of a man or beast
blood. From Matagga.

zh-def: 一些竹子放在屋內門口上方
ori-def: certain cross bamboos placed above the entrance of the door of a house, on the inside.
a cable, from takkat and arrat. See takkar, and gûmmûrgar.
a vein. Compounded of tagga and oggach.
zinûggogon, tataggogon, to thirst. Pataggogan, pinûtaggogan, p*pataggogan, ipûtaggoganna, to cause to thirst. Toggogon, nom. thrist.

zh-def: 一種珠子；深受當地人的推崇
ori-def: a kind of beads, much esteemed by the natives.
a fire-fly.

zh-def: 錨，人們在渡口停泊船的柱子
ori-def: an anchor, a post to which people moor a boat at a ferry.
a dwarf.

zh-def: 極度的；優秀的；極度強大；罕見的熱
ori-def: exceeding, excellent, as talcho mabarra, talcho matadach, exceeding strong, uncommonly hot.

zh-def: 精通的人；超過他人的權力、財富、美貌
ori-def: one who excels, or surpasses might, wealth, beauty, &c.
what? with indignation. Talla *mmara imónos, what* do you lie * rags?
a pot sherd
o no adda, a grain of rice.
o noeno, the brain pan: written *lao-n-oeno.
a large dart.
sorrel.
continual perseverance. Tal-*hon sisa, the whole day. Tûllachon *n, micham, mababat, to be constant-eating, drinking, going, &c.
the Spanish pox.
potatoes.
crumbs, fragments.
crumbled.
a particle of admiration, as ah! * that!
a pair of breeches.
Takeis, a cart. Go-or, or *or. Tateûrraû loan, the poles of a *t. Asasûû loan, the yoke.
all
a honey bee.
a spider.

zh-def: 各種污染，例如鼻涕，油脂等
ori-def: all kinds of pollution, as from snot, grease, &c.

zh-def: 焦油污染的任何東西，見下文
ori-def: anything defiled with tar, see below.

zh-def: 刺魚，有兩種: 刺魚或長得像鯊魚的魚
ori-def: a thornback, of which there are two sorts, tarra boetsina, a thornback: tarra paga aubaas, a fish somewhat resembling the shark, with a broad blotch on the nose.
or Tarraboan, a rainbow.
tsi. tat. the trickling of the eyes. Patarra-ie-ra-ien, transit.

zh-def: 一個高高聳立的小木屋，當地人經常在裡面睡覺；位於他們的房屋旁邊或田野中
ori-def: a small hut, standing high in which the natives frequently sleep; such as are beside their houses, or in the fields.
a way; mitarom' o taran, two roads that meet together. Rariedda **ran, a way that divides into two.
as tabtab. Verb Matarrar.
porcelain, china ware.
a sort of fish.
the obliquity of a thing.

tsinarran, inotûrran: and **ban, inarriban, inoarriban: and rib**jen, rinibaijen, inoribaijen. Seems ** mean loathsome, or hurtful. Thus people speak of unusual food, arriban o ** macha ja micho. It is possible that it ** injurious or deadly. But these words require to be more carefully examined.
zinûssaban, inotassaban, to hunger. Pûtassaban, pinûtassaban, pa-pûtassaban, ipûtassabanna, to cause to hunger. Nom. Tassaban, hunger.

tsinassinan, inotassinan, tassioa, to do anything for any one. Inatassinan ja rûmmozi-daû tamau, I will pay for my father. In the 2nd and 3rd person people do not say Tassinan, but Tassi. It is necessary that this word be examined. It is to be written tas-ina, just as daû-ina, for me; so also tasi-je, for you; tas-icho, for him. Præt. tsinas. fut. inosas, imp. tas ioa, sie d'r fas joa ina, take my place.

zh-def: 新的和未用過的。指人們習慣使用的所有工具，例如衣服，杯子，餐具等。
ori-def: that which is new and untried. Is said of all implements, that people are accustomed to use, as clothes, cups, dishes, &c.
(the o short) long, is only used of lifeless things.
or boezina, a fan.

a particle wherewith people enquire after any place, as dema tassone Doubale, whither does Daubale lead to? Tassono don o Batsjekan, whereabouts are the houses of Batsjekan? Dema tassono Taijoan, which is the way to Taijoan? Tassono aisi, that way.

zh-def: 人們用於房屋建築或農業的各種工具
ori-def: all kinds of implements that people use for house buildings or agriculture.
arable land.

zh-def: 一英尋（測量水深單位，合1.8米或6英尺）
ori-def: a fathom.
the ropes wherewith the deer are encircled in hunting.
hunting ground.

zh-def: 用於刺傷的工具，如劍，刀等
ori-def: instrument for stabbing, as a sword, knife, &c.

zh-def: 跳舞，或是那些將要戰鬥的人的踏步
ori-def: a dance, also the trampling of those who are about to fight.

zh-def: 當人們不敢提及令人反感的人時，所用的語帶保留的詞
ori-def: and a-obog, both words of reserve when people do not dare to mention scandalous persons.
a ricestamper. From tummatta.
how do I know?
an answer. From Tûmmam.
the first, the principal. Tummabach, and Matattabach, verb to, be the first.
a cap. From Tummachûm.
the jawbone.
an instrument to draw with.
from Tûmmachil.
instrument for cutting.
a stanchion. From Tumka.
anything to stitch with.
a covering, a pavilion, a cord.
a step. From tûmmaein.
that with which people tread, as the feet. From tummallan.
the comb, &c. of cocks.
a fish hook. From tumme.

zh-def: 用尾巴叮咬的生物所叮咬的傷口
ori-def: the sting of anything that stings with the tail.
that wherewith we compose any one. From Tummalûttala.

zh-def: 人們遮蔽自己以自由出汗
ori-def: that wherewith people cover themselves in order to perspire freely. From tummallumtum.
a frightening.
a stenchion. From Tummear.
the shaft of an arrow, the stem of a spit.
a number. Masanno attoch, the larger number. From Tûmmoch.
a spark. From Tummolillis.
see tattûllo, below.
a-looking glass.
a copy, an example.
a beholding.
thought, memory.
that wherewith people kindle.
a key. Tatto o chirrap, a toothpick. From tûm-o.
the fore finger.
an instrument, wherewith ** to sprinkle water. From tummos.
a plane. From tûmmoos.

zh-def: 東西被折斷或撕裂的末端
ori-def: the end where anything is broken off or torn. But especially pr**o extremitate membri virilis id quod e**st inhonestum.
the ornaments worn in the ears.

zh-def: 由當地人提出的要約；一塊堅硬的石頭
ori-def: an offer, by the natives. a hard stone: from tummotto.
tattose, and tattosik, a lie. From tummorik, tummose, &c.
a candle. From tummollo.

zh-def: 一束稻草，人們用來產生煙或是驅除蚊子
ori-def: a wisp of straw, with which people make a smoke, to drive away the musquitos.
see tummauka.
a number reckoned beforehand. From tumpuch.
the hair of the head.
a sort of fruit, conically shaped.

zh-def: 一種與食物一起煮熟的蔬菜
ori-def: a kind of vegetable, which is cooked with the food.
the little finger.
a kite.
the tongue.

zh-def: 各種準備好的食物，無論是魚還是肉
ori-def: all sorts of prepared food, whether fish or flesh.
the beak of birds.
a pencil to paint with. Taz-ipok o bido, a pen.

zh-def: 用來掛東西的大頭釘或木椿
ori-def: a pin or peg, on which to hang anything.
an arm.
a duck.
the pole or the upper part of the forehead.
a stork.

zh-def: 附有果實的莖，無論是在田間還是已收穫的
ori-def: a stalk, to which the fruit is attached, whether standing in the field, or already reaped.
is said of thous who strike every one. Eirreken, idem. Written teteen.
a sort of fish, called stone bream.
a badger.

zh-def: 一隻眼睛失明，因此看不到眼白
ori-def: blindness of one eye, so that the white of the eye cannot be seen. for then it is tollas.
one who is blind of one eye, this is the præs. from tummillik.
before, with respect to place. Talla zummada zinoe, ka oa tinnûam ai, what do you seek, it lies there before you. Matatinnûan, mi. ma. forwards. Patatinnûam, trans.
water.
rain water.
river water.
well water.
see water.
a kind of bird.
a number, & tatoch, a numbering.
a hole, a door, a window. From tummochab, tattochab, an opening.
zinochorochen, tatochoróchen, to be set a coughing.
marrow.
snipe.
a splinter.
a calm. From pattok.
jingles, worn by young men.
pimples, like small warts.
full of pimples.
who?
a sea horn.
a lattice, a grating.
an overgrown man.

zh-def: 一個中文單詞，意思是祖國
ori-def: a Chinese word, meaning Fatherland.
tsi. tat. imp. tara, pass. ta-an, tsina, inota-an, the reading of a list. Pata-a, tran. nom. tattûa, the reading aloud; and Maatttata-a, one who reads the roll.

zh-def: 一種蘆葦，人們用它們來做箭
ori-def: a sort of reed, of which men make arrows.
a firefly, as tai-tai.
we, us. But differs from namo.
a sort of flute.
the same sort of flute; very long.
the heart.
the top or upper part of anything.

zh-def: 一隻眼睛失明，但可以看到眼白
ori-def: blindness of one eye, but so that the white can be seen.
tsi. tat. tosasjiena, pas. tosa-sjienen, tsinosasjien, &c. to have the tooth-ache. Tos-asji, the tooth-ache.
tsi. tatsi. tsibarasabasûa, to aim at drectly, as tsimisi.
tsini. tatsi, tsianna, &c. see in Zimianna, to be distrustful.
tsini. tatsi. itsijka, itsijk, initsijk, inoitsijk, to filli p, to make a point thus [.] nom. tattsik, a tittle point. See zimiek, under Tummesik, ditto.
tsini. tatsi. &c. see under in Z.
tsini. tatsi. tsikia, to leer, to leok askance. Patsiek, trans. tatsiki, nom. Ma-atatsiki.
tsi. tats. tsikoa, pass. tsikoan, tsiniko, inotsikoon, to tight a house that hangs over. Patsiko, trans. nom.
tsini. tatsi. tsimisa, tsimisan, tsinimisan, inotsimisan, to take some food, to taste. Paksimi, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 像在吸手指或菸斗，但不是乳房
ori-def: tsi. tat. tsipisiepa, pass. tsipisiepen, tsimipsiep, inotsitsiepen, to suck (but not the breast) as a finger, tobacco pipe, &c. Patsiptsiep, trans. Tatsiptsiep, a sucking. Ma-atatsip-tsiep, a sucker. Tsiptsiepan, that of which men suck, as a tobacco pipe, &c.
see Zimisakal
see Zimisi, tatsisi, nom.
tsini. tatsi. tsijtsijsa, to cut off the joint of wood or bamboo.
west. Matatsip, mi, ma, weatherly. Patatsip, trans.

zh-def: 像那些害怕被推走的人一樣趕快安頓好自己
ori-def: tsinumbar, tatumbar, tubarra, tubarren, tsienbar, inotubbarren, to set one's-self down fast, as those do who fear being pushed away. Pûtûbbar, panatûbbar, &c. to cause such to be done.

tsinûmboel, tatûmboel, tubboela, tubboelen, tsienboel, inotubboelen, to seek any one. Patubboel, pinatubboel, papatubboel, ipatubboela, ipatubboel, &c. to cause to be sought. Tattubboel, nom. henve kar tattubboel, mau tattubboel.
tsinumcho, tatumcho, tûchoa, let the u be scarcely heard) tuchoan, **enecho, inotuchoon, to bow, Patû-**o, pi. pa. ipatuchoa. to cause to bow.
tsi. tat. tóchoa, the commencement of the north monsoon. Provb. **choa ja masias sai don ja dalij ma*roos ja badda, they use this pro**b, because the young men do not **rry unless in the cold season.
tsi. tat. tikka, &c. (let the u be scarcely heard) to support, to prop up.
pi. pa. ipatukka, &c. to cause support. Tattûkka, nom. a prop.

zh-def: 將自己隱藏在洞中和斷崖後面以獵殺鹿
ori-def: zinumkach, tatumkach, tuk-**cha, tukkachen, zienkach, inotuk-**chen, to hunt deer by concealing one's-self in the holes, and behind the edges. Patukkach, pinûtukkach, pa*ukkach, &c. to cause to hunt.
zinummaam, tatummaam, ta-*, tûmen, zinaam, inotamen, to an-*er. Pûtaam, pinûtaam, papataam, **tama, &c. to cause to answer.

zh-def: 在室內或野外進行各種工作
ori-def: tsinummaap, tatummaap, ta-*tapen, tsinaap, inotapen, to do all kinds of work, either in the house or in the field. Also to attack, to fall upon. **maap, husbandry, &c. passiv. pret. tataap, work, labour. Ma-atataap, a worker, a labourer.

zh-def: 開始；首先做任何事；被另一個人追隨
ori-def: zinummaas, tatummaas, tasutasan, zinasan, inotûsan, to begin, to do anything first, to be follwed by another. Pataas, pi. pa. ipatasa, ipataas, inipataas, to cause to begin, &c.
zinummabba, tatummabba, tabba, tabbaan, zinubba, inotabbaan, to stick. Patabba, pinûtabba, papatabba, ipatabba, &c. to cause to stick.
tsi. tat. imp. tabacha, pass. tabachen, tsinabach, inotabachen, to do anything first; see also matattabach. Patabach, trans. to cause to be done. Tattabach, nom. a commencement.

zh-def: 跳舞，戰鬥或想要戰鬥的人的搖擺
ori-def: zinummabbak, tatummabbak, tabakka, tabakken, zinabakkan, inotabakkan, to dance, also the swaggering of those who fight, or who wish to fight. Pûtabbak, pinatabbak, papatabbak, &c. to cause such to be done.

zinummachal, tatummachal, tachalla, tachallen, zinachal, inotachallen, to remove the earth, as with a hoe, a spade, &c. It is changed into d see dummachol. Padachal, pinûdachal, papadachal, &c. to cause to be dug up.
zinummabbis, tatummabbis, tabbisa, tabbisan, zinabbisan, inotabbisan, to fan. Patabbis, pinatabbis, papatabbis, ipatabbisa, ipatabbis, inipatabbis, inoipatabbis, to cause to fan.
zinummach-il, tatummach-il, tach-illa, tach-illen, to win, to win a bet. Patach-il, pinatach-il, papatach-il, ipatach-illa, ipatach-il, inoipatach-il, to cause such to be done.
tsi. tat. tach-oa. same as pazinado; mautadacj-o, idem patacho, nom. tattacho, interpretation, intercession. Ma-atattacho, an interpreter, an interceder.

zinummachum, tatummachum, tachumma, tachumman, zinachumman, inotachumman, to put on one's hat, to cover one's head. Patachum, pinatachum, papatachum, ipatachumma, &c. to cause the hat to be put on. Tattachum, the thing put on, (namely the hat.) Tummakkum, tsi. tat. imp. takumma, part. takkumman, &c. means all kinds of covering.
tsi. tat. tachossan, tsinachossan, inotachossan, grass, &c. to cut off. Patachos, also chummoschos.
tsinummagcha, tatummagcha, tagcha, tagchaan, zinagcha, ino*agchaan, to chop, to hack to hew. Patatagcha, pi. pa. ipatagcha, inipatagcha, to cause to be chopped.

zinummagcho, tatummagcho, tagcho, to overhang, not to stand upright: It is sometime changed in d, which see. Padagcho, pinadagch*, dagchoa, dagchoon, zinagcho, inodachoon, to cause to overhang: in which case it is ipadagchoa, ipadagcho, &c.

zinummagchoch, tatu*nmagchoch, tagchocha, tagchochen, zinagchoch, inotagchochen, to scoop. Tummagchoch o bigeno, to skim, to scoop off the forth. Patagchoch, ** natagchoch, papatagchoch, ipatagchocha, inipatagchoch, to cause to scoop. Tummagchoch o tono malla, to l*** water with a bucket.

zinummairs, tatummairs, **isa, taisan, zinaisan, inotaisan, to climb up. Tummaies i kittas, to climb up a ladder. Pûtaies, pinûtaies, papa***, ipataisa, ipataies, inipataies, inoip**ies, to cause to climb.

tsi. tat. taiba, to do anything together, or in company. P** &c. to cause such to be done. ** comes aurri a teiba, that is the ** money given when people work together, as if they said, aúrëdda a teiba, so that this noun seems to come from moriedda and tummûiba, to work together. For they say also, Moriëdda o taiba, and Moribal o taibe, to leave offm to cease such working together.

zinummakal,tatummakal, ta kalla, takallan, zinûkallan, inotakal
lan, to put on a woman's head-band. Pûtakal, pinûtakal, papûtûkal, ipatakalla, &c. to cause such to be done. Written dummakal.

zh-def: 阻止任何人上路，或阻止他前進
ori-def:
zinummakas, fatummakas, takassa, takassan, inotakassan, to stop any one in the road, or to turn him out of the way. Patakas, pinatakas, papûtakas, ipûtakassa, ipatakas, &c.
to cause such to be done.
zinummakkis, tatummakkis, taksa, taksen, zinaksan, inotaksan, to stick together, and make one. Patakis, pi. pa. ipûtaksa, ipûtakkis, &c. to cause such to be done.

zinummakkoob, tatummûkkoob, takkoba, takkoban, zinakkoban, inotakkoban, to cover, to cover entirely. Tûmmakkoob o macha, to blind the eyes. Parakkoob, pi. pa. ipaipatakkoba, &c. to cause to be covered. Also to cover with a rug.
zinummala, tatummala, talûtûlanm zinala, inotalan, to find, ro welcome. Patala, pinatala, papûtala, ipûtala, &c. to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 撫平；直到各種情緒平靜
ori-def: zinummalattala, tatnmmalattala, tallattala, tallattalan, zinalattalan, inotallattalan, to pacify, to still, to calm all sorts of emotions. Patalattala. pi*atalattala, papûtalattala, &c. to cause such to be done.
zinummalas. tatummalas, talassa, talassen, zinalassen, inotallassen, to tread under foot. Patallas, pinûtallas, papûtallas, ipatallassa, ipatallas, &c. to cause such to be done.
zinummalizi, tatummalizi, talizia, talizian. zinalizian, inotalizian, to dance. Patalizi, pinatalizi, papûtalizi, ipatalizia, &c. to cause to dance. Sometimes the t is changed into d, see dummalizi.

zh-def: 在任何地方採取行動，或是激發、發揮自己的力量
ori-def: zinummalpon, tatummalpon, talponna, talponnan, zinalponnan, inotalponnan, to betake one's self any where, or set forward. Also to stir one's self up, and exert one's strength. **talpou, pi. pa. ipûtalponna, ipatalpon, &c. to cause such to be done.
zinummallo, tatummallo, talloa, talloon, zinalloon, inotalloon, to allure, to bait. Patallo, pinatallo, papatallo. &c. to cause to allure.
zinummattal, tatummattal, tattallan, zinattal, inotattallan, to trample with feet. Pûtattal, pinatattal, papatattal, ipatattalla, ipatattal, inipa- &c. to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 遮掩自己或他人以產生汗水
ori-def: zinummallumtum, tatummallumtum, inotallumtum, to cover up one's self or another in order to produce perspiration. Patallumtum, pi. pa. ipatallumtumma, &c.

zinummanna, tatummanna, tanna, tanuaan, zinanna, inotannaan, to open. Tanna osja chachab o donoe, open the door of the house. Patanna, pi. pa. ipatanna, &c. to cause to open. Tattannanna o parara, an opening to let ** light, that is, a window.

zinummao, tatummao, taoa, taoan, zinaoan, inotaoan, to sprinkle, as with water, salt thin m*d, &c. but to cover wood, stone, and other thhings that do not spread is magga. Wherewith * itaoon, inoitaoon. Patao, pinatao, papatao, ipatatoa, ipatao, inipatao, &c. to cause such to be done.

zinummammoos, tatummammoos, itammosa, itammoos, initammoos, inoitammoos, to crumble, to shred. Patammoos, pi. pa. ipat*mmosa. ipatammoos. &c. to cause such to be done. Tummammoos, means to stick anything in the mouth.

zinummapacha, tatummapacha, tapacha, tapachanni, and tapachaiyan, zinapachanni and zinapachayan. inotapachanni and inotapachayan, to put on one's breeches. Patapacha, pi. pa. &c. to cause such to be done.
tsi. tat. tapalla, tapallan, tninapal, inotapallan, to stumble in the way. Patapal, trans. nom. tattapal.

zh-def: 像人們洗衣服一樣用棍子拍打；以打落灰塵
ori-def: zinummapies, tatummapies, tapisa. tapisen. zinapies, inotapisen, to beat with a stick, as people do their clothes, in order to knock dust or dirt. Patapies, zinatapies, papatapies, &c. to cause such to be done.
zinummapitapies, tatummapitapies, inotapitapisen, to beat with many strokes. Patapitapies, pi. pa. &c. to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 選擇砍伐一塊田地；選擇一位女士
ori-def: tsi. tat. tara, taran, tsirara, inotaran, to choose anything first: as tummar' o mioa, tummar o mammali balach, to choose to cut down a field; to choose a lady. Patara, trans. ta*ara, a choice. Hence karri tatta-a, mau tat-ta-a, to choose one another.

zh-def: 把撒在地板上的東西集合起來，例如散落在地上的米
ori-def: zinummarad, tatummarad, taradda, taradden, zinarad, inotaradden, to gather up what another has scattered, as rice thrown over the floor. Patarad, pi. pa. ipataradda, ipatarad, &c. to cause wuch to be done.

zh-def: 在這裡和那裡，彼此分散，這裡有一些，那裡也有一些
ori-def: tsi. tat. tamaramarra, tamaramarren, tsinaramar, inotaramarren, to be here and there, separated from one another, some here and some there. Pataramar, trans. such a scattering.

zh-def: 像草，植物和其他小東西一樣舞動
ori-def: tsi. tat. taratralla, to wave as grass, plants, and other little things do, &c. differs from lummitallito. Parakal, trans.
same as dummarau. Patarau, pi. pa. ipataraua, &c. as Padarau.
same as dummaraudau. Patarautau. pi. pa. same as padaraudau.
tsi. tat. tariesa, to intercept any one in his way. Pataries, trans. Tummariës o azies, to intercept the enemy. Nom. tattariës, an intercepting. Ma-atattaries, a hard runner, who overtakes another.

zh-def: 改變非常相似的事物，以至於人們很容易將它誤認為另一種，有意圖的欺騙
ori-def: zinummaroggi, tatummaroggi, taroggia, taroggian. zinaroggian, inotaroggian, to change things which are so much alike that they can be easily mistaken one for the other, and this with intent to deceive. Pataroggi, pinataroggi, papataroggi, ipataroggia, &c. to cause such to be done.
tsi. tat. taromman, tsinaromman, inotaromman, to betray. Pataromma, trans. tattaromma, treachery. Hence karri-tattaromma, mautattanom-ma. Ma-atattaromma, a traitor.

zh-def: 用扇子遮蓋住自己，以防日曬雨淋，沒有完全遮蓋住。或用地毯或類似物覆蓋，不同於 tummakkoob
ori-def: zinummaroob, tatummaroob, tarroba, tarroban, zinarroban, inotarroban, to cover as people do the head with a fan, to pretect them from sun or rain: thus not entirely covered. Or to cover with a rug or such like in which it differs from tummakkoob. Tatarroob, pi. pa. ipatarroba, &c. to cause to cover.
tsi. tat. imp. tarossa, to pick anything here and there, just as people pluck the ripe ears in a field. Patarros, trans.
zinummassal, tstummassal, *assalla, tassallen, sinassal, inotassal*en, to catch at once, to apprehend. Patassal, pi. pa. ipatassalla, &c. to cause such to be done. Tattasal, nom.

zinummassin, tatummassin, *assina, tassin, zinassin, inotassin, to entertain any one. Patassin, pi. pa. *patassin, inipatassina, inoipatassin, to cause such to be done. Tattassin, *n expectation, hope.
zinummatas, tatummatas, ta*asa, tatasan, zinatas, inotatasan, to fathom. Patatas, pi. pa. ipatatasa, &c. to cause to be fathomed. Tatas, a fathom.
zinummatta, tatummatta, tat-*a, tittan, zinattan, inotattan, to stamp seed out of the husk. Patatta, pi. pa. patatta, inipatatta, inoipatatta, to cause to be stamped out. Tatta, a *ice stamper.
zinummattam, tatummattam, tattamma, tattammen, zinattam, *notattammen, to hold fast. Patattam, pi. pa. ipatattamma, ipatattam, &c. to cause to hold fast.

zh-def: 第一個做任何事情，無論是喝酒，說話還是品嚐食物
ori-def: zinummau-aab, tatummau-aab, tauba and taûmasan, taûba and *aûmasan, tsinauaban and tsinauma*an, inotaulan and inotaumasan, to do anything first or before another, whether drinking, speaking, or tasting. Patau-aab, pi. pa. ipatauaba, ipatauaab, &c. to cause such to be done, as mananat. Tattau-aab, or tau-aab. nom. subst is used adverbially as before.

zinummauka, tatummauka, tauka, taukan, zinauka, inotaukan, to do anything over again. Patauka, pinatauka, papatauka, ipatauka, inipatauka, inoipatauka, to cause such to be done. Tummaukauka, zi. ta. to increase Tummauka. Pataukauka, &c. as patauka.
same as tummauka. Pataula, same as patauka. Gummalich, idem. nom gagallich: pagallich, idem, mon. gagallich.

zinummaulaula, tatummaulaula, taulaula, zinaulaula, inotaulaulan, to do anything very often; same as Tummaukauka. Pataulaula, pi. pa. &c. as Pataukauka,  to cause anything to be done frequently. Gummalle_allich, idem. Pagallegallich, id.
zinummaumasa, tatummaumasa, taumasa, taumasanni and taumasayan, zinaumasanni and zinaumasayan, same as Matinnaam. Pataumasa, pi, pa, ipataumasa, inipûtaumasa, inoipataumasa, same as patinnaam.
zinummauraya, tatummauraya, tauraya, taurayan, zinaurayan, inotaurayan, to put into a fright. Patauraya, pi, pa, ipûtaûraya, inipatauraya, inoipatauraya, to cause to be afraid.
tsinumme, tatumme, tea, teen, tene, inoteen, to angle. Pûte, pinate, papate, ipatea, ipate, inipate, inoipate, to cause thus to fish. Tatte, nom.

tsinûmmea, tatummea, te-a, te-ûan, tene-a, inote-aûn, to punish. Pûtea, pinatea, papûtea, ipûte-û, inipate-a, inoipatea, to cause such to be done. Tattea, nomen, that wherewith people punish, or the punishment itself.
tsi. tat. tsänna, tsean, tsinean, inoteän, same as tûmmaiba. Patsan, trans. Tean, nom.

tsinummear, tatummear, ettear, inetear, inoetear, to draw forth, to drag along. Pûtear, pinatear, papatear, ipatearra, ipatearen, inipatear, inoipatear, to cause to be dragged. Tattear, nom. a drawing forth; this word is also applied to the poles of a cart, between which an ox is fastened, in order to draw it.
tsinummear, tatummear, tearra, tearren, tsinear, inotearren, to support, to prop up. Patear, pinatear, papatear, ipatearra, ipatear, inipatear, inoipatear, to cause such to be done. Tattear, a prop.
zinummeer, tatummeer, tera, terin, zineer, or tineer, inoterin, to avoid, to shun either a stab, or a blow. Pateer, pinateer, papateer, ipatera, ipateer, inipateer, inoteer, to cause to avoid.

zinummenon, tatummenon, tinnona, tinnonnen, zininnon, inotonnonnen, also tinnonnan, zininnonnan, inotinnonnan, to weave. Patinnon, pi, pa, ipatinnonna, ipatinnon, inipatinnon, inoipatinnon, to cause to weave.

zh-def: 用手或手臂依靠在某物上
ori-def: zinummepar, tatummepar, teparra, teparran, zineparran, inoteparran, to lean on anything with the hand or arm. Patepar, pinatepar, pa. ipateparra, ipatepar, inipatepar, inoipatepar, to cause to lean.
zinummerap, tatummerap, terappa, terappen, zinerap, inoterappen, to lick. Paterap, pinaterap, papaterap, inoipaterap, to cause to lick.

zh-def: 刺進（鹿）；標出記號、特徵（如人們把印章壓在蠟上）
ori-def: zinummilla, tatummilla, itilla-a, initilla, inoitilla, to set in, to print in, to stick in, as people pierce a deer with a spear; or to imprint, as people press a seal on wax; while the impression is expressed by the pass. pret. of the verb initilla, that is, that which is impressed. It means also to cook food for children. Pûtilla, pinatilla, papûtilla, ipatilla, inipatilla, inoipatilla, to canse an impression to be made.
zinummillak, tatûmmillak, tillaggen, zinillag, inotillaggen, to appear, to seem. Patillak, pinatillak, papûtillak, ipatillagga, ipatillak, inoipatillak, to cause to appear.

zh-def: 被戳瞎一隻眼睛（使眼白無法被看到）
ori-def: zinummillik, tatûmmillik, tillikka, tillikken, zinillik, inotillikken, to be struck with blindness in one eye, so that the white of the eye cannot be seen, for then it is tollassen, from tummollas. Patillik, pinatillik, papatillik, ipatillikka, ipatillik, inipatillik, inoipatillik, to cause such to be done. Tûtillik, such a blinding.

zh-def: 做房屋地基；用木片用力敲打
ori-def: to level the ground for the foundation of a house, and to beat it hard with flat pieces of wood.

zinummittil, tatummittil, tittilla, tittillan, zinittillan, inotittillan, to beat in. Patiltil, pi. pa, ipatiltilla, ipatiltil, &c. to cause such to be done. Tattiltil, a nail or peg which people drive in, also the driving in itself.
tsi: tat: tirtirra, to tremble, Patirtir, transit: tattirtir, nom. a trembling.
zinummis, tatûmmis, itissa, itis, initis, inoitis, to throw away, to lose. Patis, pinatis, papatis, ipûtissa, ipatis, inipatis, inoipatis, to cause to be thrown away. Maatûttis, one who throws away.
zinûmmissan, tatûmmissan, tissanna, to sigh. Patissan, pinatissan, papatissan, ipatissanna, ipatissan, inipatissan, inoipatissan, to cause to sigh. Tatissan, a sigh. Maatattissan, one who sighs.

zinummo-ach, tatûmmo-ach, toacha, toûch-en, zino-ach-an, inotoach-an, to come out, to come to light. Thus the sun and moon are said tûmmo-ach, to rise; grass and vegetables, tûmmo-achibabota, to come above the ground; and men, tûmmoach ta, to come out into the street. Pûtoach, pinatoach, papûtoach, ipatoacha, ipatoach, inipatoach, inoipatoach, to cause such to be done. Tattoach, a rising, a coming up.
zinummo, tatummo, toa, toon, zino, inotoon, to reach out the hand to receive anything. Pato, pinato, papato, ipato, inipato, inoipato, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 剔〈牙齒〉；刺進；刺傷；牴傷〈如公鹿用其犄角〉
ori-def: zinum-o, tatum-o, to-a, toûn, zino, inotoan, to pick, to stick. Tumo chirrap, to pick the teeth. Tûm-otaddarries, to put the key in a lock, to lock it up, the locking up itself. Also to gore, as a deer with his horns.
zinummoch, tatummoch, toch-a, tochen, zinoch, inotoch-en, to number. Tummoch o bido, to read. Patoch, pinatoch, papatoch, ipatoch-a, ipatoch, inipatoch, inoipatoch, to cause to be numbered.

zinummochab_, tatummochab, tochûbba, tochbàban, zinochabban, inotochabban, to make a hole. Pûtochab_, pinatochab_, papatochab, ipûtochabb_a, ipatochab_, inipatochab_, inoipatochab, to cause such to be done. Tattochab, the making a hole; tochab, a hole.

zinummod, tatummod, todda; (this passive is used respecting a field. Bonna todden, the field is planted. But itod, initod, inoitod, means the rice &c is sown;) todden, zinod, inotodden, cover the seed with earth when it is sown. Patod, pi, pa, ipûtodda, ipatod, &c. Tatod, the covering of that which is sown after the sowing. Taddodayan, the sowing time or place.

zinummoelakkies, tatummoelakkies, toelakisa, toelakisen, zinoelakies, inotoelakkisen, to do anything unexpectedly; same as Poelakies. Tummoelakkies o poch o cho, to shoot a man suddenly. Tûmmoelakkies, o payach, o riba, to soil a coat unexpectedly. Patoelakkies, pi, pa, ipatoelakisa, ipatoelakies, inipatoelakies, inoipatoelakies, to cause such to be done. Tattoelakies, a mistake, a missing. Hence, kar tattoelakkies, mau tattoelakkies. Mà-atattoelakkies, one who misses.

zh-def: 推翻；翻倒；絆倒；敲〈門、釘子〉
ori-def: zinummok, tatummok, tokka, tokken, sinok, inotokken, to overthrow. Tummok o mallo, to upset a cup. Tummok o bato, to knock against a stone, to stumble. Tummok, o don, to knock at a house, or a door. Tummok o tazirrisan, to hit a nail or pin, in order to drive it in. Patok, pi, pa, ipatokka, ipatok, inipatok, inoipatok, to cause such to be done. Tattok, a knocking, also that wherewith we knock. Tattok a oos, quasitattokaûs, the beat of a drum. Tattoksayan, the place where people beat, also the time when the gong is beaten.
tsi, ta tokkóa, tokkoûn, pass. &c. to heat up, to lay in a heap. Patokko, to cause such to done. Tokko, a heap.

zh-def: 用力推翻；用力翻倒；嚴重絆倒；用力敲〈門、釘子〉
ori-def: zinum: tatum: tókkotokka, tokkotokken, zinokkotok, inotokkotokken, the redoubling of tummok. Patokkotok, pi, pa, ipûtokkotokka, ipatokkotok, &c. the redoubling of patok.

tsinûmmolillis, tatummolillis, (imp. tollalisa,part. tollolissen, tsinullllolis, inottollolissen, nom. tollalis, a spark, a bit of fire,) to give out sparks, as red hot iron does when it is beaten. Patollilis, pi, pa, ipatolollossa., ipûtolillis, inipatolillis, inoipatolillis, to cause to give out sparks.
tsi: tat: tullalla-a, tûllallaan, tsinullalla-an, the blossoming of trees: inotullalallû-an. Patullalla, transitiv. Tallalla, nom. blossom.

zh-def: 一隻眼睛瞎掉〈但可以看到眼白〉
ori-def: tsi, tat, tollassa, tollassen, tsinollûs, inotollassen, to be blind of one eye, but so as that the white can be seen. Patollas, trans. Tattollas, such blindness.

zinummollo, tatummollo, tollóa, tolloan, zinolloan, inotolloan, to set on fire. Tummollo, tatollo, to light a candle. Patóllo, pinatollo, papûtollo, ipatolloa, ipatollo, inipatollo, inoipatollo, to cause to be lighted; nom. tattollo, a candle.

zinummoltol, tatûmmoltol, toltolla, toltollan, zinoltollan, inotoltollan, to smoke with a whisp of straw, called tattoltol, in order to drive away the moschettoes. Patoltol, pinûtoltol, papûtoltol, ipatoltolla, ipatoltol, inipatoltol, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 海或河第一次水位上升
ori-def: tsi: tat: tonnoga, tomnogan, tsinonog, innotonnogan, the first rising of the water in the sea or rivers, Tmmonok sai o to, de abas, desabba. Tattonnog, nom. the commencement of flood tide.

zinummoob, tattûmmoob, itòbo, itoob, initoob, inoitoob, to sprinkle water, also to sprinkle with the same, when it is toba, tóban, zinoban, inotoban. Patoob, pinatoob, papûtoob, ipûtoba, ipatoob, inipatoob, inoipatoob, to cause to be sprinkled.
zinummo-ol, tatûmmo-ol, toolla, to-ollan, zino-ollan, inoto-ollon, same as tummollo. Pato-ol, pi, pa, ipato-olla, ipato-ol, &c. same as Patollo.

ziniummoos, tattummoos, tosa, tosan, zinosan, inotósan, where with? itoos, initoos, inoitoos, to rub. Patoos, pinatoos, papatoos, ipûtosa, ipatoos, intipatoos, inoipatoos, to cause to be rubbed. Tûmmóostoos, intend.

zinummorraich, tattummorraich, torraicha, torraichen, zinorraich, inotorraichen, to slide, or slip of, to slide out. Pûtorraich, pi, pa, ipatorraicha, ipatorraich, inipatorraich, inoipatorraich, to cause such to be done.
zinummorrik, tatummorrik, torrika, torriken, zinorrik, inotorriken, to tell lies. Pûtorrik, pinatorrik, papatorrik, ipatorrikka, ipatorrik, inipatorrik, inoipatorrik, to cause to lie.

zh-def: 閃爍〈如螢火蟲在黑暗中一樣發光或星星在黑夜閃爍〉
ori-def: tsi: tat: torritorria, torritorrian, tsinotorritorri, inotorritorrian, to flicker, to glitter as the fire flies in the dark, also as the stars in the night. Tummaitas, idem. Pataitas, idem. Patorritorri, trans. Torritorri, nom. a glittering, also a fire fly. Taitai, idem.
zinummorritorrik, tatummerritorrik, torritorrikka, torritorrikken, zinorritorrik, inotorritorrikken, idem. Patorritorrik, an increase of tûmmorrik.

zh-def: 漏〈從屋頂、毀壞船隻等漏出〉
ori-def: zinummorro, tatummorro, torroan, zinorroan, inotorroan, to leak, to leak out, either through roofs or through broken vessels and so forth. Patorro, pinatorro, papatorro, ipatorroa, ipatorro, inipatorro, inoipatorro, &c. Tummorrotorro, intend.

tsi: tat: torrocha, torrochen, tsinorroch, inotorrochen, to drag, to pull after one, neutr. Patorroch, trans. to draw, activ. to cause to be drawn. Tattorroch, nom. a dragging. Tummorrotorroch, intend.

zh-def: 往下看；看〈進〉玻璃或鏡子
ori-def: zinummorrod, tatummorrod, torroda, torrodan, zinorrodan, inotorrodan, to look downwards, to look in a glass. Pûtorrod, pi, pa, ipatorrodda, ipûtorrod, inipûtorrod, inoipatorrod, to cause such to be done. Tummorrotorrod, intend.

zinummose, tatummose, toséa, tosein, zinose, inotosein, same as tummorrik; patose, pinatose, papatose, ipatosea, ipûtose, inipatose, inoipatose, same as patorrik. Tummosetose and patosetose, same as tummorritorrik and patorritorrik.
tsi: tat: toshieka, pass. to shiekan, &c. to spatter, to bedaub. Patoshiek, trans. Tattoshiek, nom.
zinummosik, tatummosik, tosikka, tosikken, zinòsik, inotosikken, same as tummorrik. Patossik, same as patorrik. Tummositosik, and patositosik, same as tummorritorrik and patorritorrik.
tsi: tat: tôtta, to let wind. Patot, to cause such to done. Tottat, foul wind.

zinummotto, tatummotto, tottoa, tottoon zinótto, inotottoon, to forge, to beat any thing to powder. Patotto, pinatotto, papatotto, ipaitottoa, ipatotto, inipatotto, inoipatotto, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 發芽；果實在花落後發芽
ori-def: tsi: tat: tottoa, tottoòn, tsinotto, inotottoon, the budding, or shooting forth of the fruit after the blossoms fall off.

zinumpa, tatumpa, tuppa, tuppûan, zienpa, inotuppaan, to think, to reflect. Patuppa, pi, pa, ipatuppa, inipatuppa, inoipatuppa, to cause to to think. Tumpatuppa, intend. Tattuppa, thoughts. Maatattuppa, one who thinks.

zinumpas, tattumpas, tuppasa, tuppasen, zienpas, inotuppasin, to tread with the foot on one side. Patuppas, pinatuppas, papatuppas, ipatuppasa, ipatuppas, inipatuppas, inoipatuppas, to cause such to be done. Tattuppus, nom. Tumpatuppas, indicative tumpas.
zinumpies, tatumpies, tuppisa, tuppisen, zinupies, inotuppisen, same as tummagga. Patuppies, pi, pa, ipûtuppisa, ipatuppies, same as pataga.

zinumpoch, tattumpoch, ituppocha, ituppoch, inituppoch, inoituppoch, to fix in the ear rings: where to? tuppocha, tuppochan, zienpochan, inotuppochan. Patuppoch, pi, pa, ipatuppocha, ipatuppoch, inipatuppoch, inoipatuppoch, to cause such to be done. Tattuppock, ear-rings.
tsi, ta, tupporra, tupporren, tsienpor, inotupporren, the hatching of birds. Pûtûppor, transiti. tatuppor, nom. a hatching.

zh-def: 數算；在心中計算或測量
ori-def: zinumpuk, tattumpuk, tuppukka, tuppukken, zienpuk, inotuppuken, to count, to reckon up any thing in the mind. Patuppuk, pinatuppuk, pa. ipatuppukka, ipatuppuk, &c.

zinumrach, tattumrach, tirracha, tirrachen, zinirrach, inotirrachen, the bursting of water through a dam. The escaping of a fish through a hole or rent in the net. The running out of paddy or such like article through a sack: the place where it leaks is tirrachan, zinirrachan, ino. &c. Patirrach, pi, pa, ipatirracha. &c.
tsinumsar, tattumsar, tsarren, tsiensar, inotsarren, to shine, to illumine. Pasar, pinazar, papazar, ipûzarra, ipazar, inipazar, inoipazar, to cause to shine. Tatsar, nom. appearance.
tsi: ta: tsarra, to stick, to stab. Tumsar o binnan, to stab a deer with a spear.
tsi: tat: tsika, tsiken, tsinick, inotsiken, to stain, to spot. Patsik, transit. Tatsik, a spot.

zinumtum, tattumtum, tumtumma, tumtummen, zinumtam, inotumtummen, to fast, to deny the stomach its food. Patumtum, pinatumtum, papatumtum, ipatumtumma, ipatumtum, inipatumtum, inoipatumtnm, to cause such to be done.
tsinumso, tatumso, tsoa, tsoan, tsiensoan, inotsoan, to assent by a nod. Patso, pinatso, papatso, ipatsoa, ipatso, inipatso, inoipatso, to cause such to be done. Tatso, a nod.
between: tuppach o don, between the houses: tuppach o ranna, amongst the hills. The verb neuter is matuppach, to be between two, and the active, Patuppach, from the root tuppach.

zh-def: 把果實聯繫在樹或植物上的莖
ori-def: the stalk wherewith the fruit is fastened to the tree or plant.
a troop of men or beasts, a generation, a principal reason.

zh-def: 人或野獸皮膚上的毛〈但不指頭髮、鬍子和眉毛〉
ori-def: the hair on the skin of men or beasts, excepting the hair of the head, beard, or eye-brows. it is written dûppoch.
sugar. Tuppoos o bato, sugar candy.
a fire-fly same as Taitai. The verb Maturriturri. Mataitai.

inummachol, aummachol, achòlla, achollen, inachol, inoachòllan, to lay any thing out of the way. Pûachol, pinûachol, papûachol, ipûacholla, ipûachol, inipaachol, inoipaachol, to cause to be laid aside.

inûmmadach, aûmmadach, adacha, adachen, inadachan, inoadachan,: what? iadach, iniadach, inoiadach, to hang up. Ummadach o tairien, to hang up beads; ummaadach o ballasau, to hang up a sword. Paadach, pinaadach, papaadach, ipaadach, inipaadach, inoipaadach, to do so to another, to cause to be done.

inummadok, aummadok, adokka, adokken, inadok, inoadokken, to pick and choose. Elli ohinûmmar o baûsje tapos ja assaban: inummadokchono kinummossi: the Dutch have not burnt down the whole village : they have picked out the disobedient. Paadok, pi, pa, ipûadokka, ipaadok. &c. to cause such to be done.
inummado, aummado, addoa, addoan, inaddoan, inoaddoan, to dissuade. Paadde, pinaaddo, pa. ipaaddoa, ipaaddo, inipaaddo, inoipaaddo, to cause to dissuade. Ummoossó, idem.

inummalappo, aummalappo, alappoa, alappoon, inalappo, inoalappoon, from which are derived alappoan, inalappoan, inoalappoon, to heave up, to lift up. Paalappo, pinaalappo, papaalappo, ipaalappoa, ipaalappo, inipaalappo, inoipaalappo, to cause to lift up.
inum: aum: aoa, aoon, inao, inoaoon, the melting of salt: trans. pa-ao, melted salt, brine: ao-no-soa, brine for washing wounds.

zh-def: 用雙手捏掐在一起的方式把東西拿出來
ori-def: inummapar, aummapar, aparra, aparren, inapar, inoaparren (that out of which it is taken) aparran, inaparran, inoaparran, to take any thing out with the hand or fingers pinched close together. Ummapar o inochan, inai mallo: to take, food out of a dish. Ummapar o dassono, innai roboen, to take rice out of a bag. Ummapar o boono innai kallaman, to take out of a large pot, &c. Paapar, pi, pa, ipaaparra, ipaapar, inipaapar, inoipaapar, to cause such to be doue.
inummapach, aummapach, apacha, apachan, inapachan, inoapachan, to climb, to climb up. Paapach, pinaapach, papaapach, ipaapacha, ipaapach, inipaapach, inoipaapach, to cause to climb.

inummarras, aummarras, arrassa, arrasan, inarrasan, inoarrassan, to stride, to step over, to pass by. Paarras, pinaarras, papaarras, ipaarasa, ipaarras, inipaaras, inoipaarras, to cause such to be done.
inummaron, aummaron, aronna, aronnen, inaron, inoaronnen, to roll up. Paaron, pinaaron, papaaron, ipaaronna, ipaaron, inipaaron, inoipaaron, to cause to roll up. NB. The r is sometimes doubled.
inummatat, aummatat, atatta, atatten, inatat, inoatatten, to chew. Paatat, pinaatat, papaatat, ipaatatta, inipaatat, inoipaat, to cause to chew.

inummillag, aummillag, illagga, illaggen, inillag, inoillaggen, to unfold, to open out. Ummelag o naupoot, o bido, to unfold a cloth or a book. Paillag, pinaillag, papaillag, ipaelagga, ipaelag, inipaelag, inoipaelag, to cause such to be done.

inummelis, aumelis, olissa, olissoan, inolissan, ino-olissan, to take off the lid, or cover. Ummelis o babchab, to open the lid of a pot. Paolis, pinaolis, paaolis, ipaolissa, ipaolis, inipaolis, inoipaolis, to cause such to be done.

inummenig, aummenig, enigga, eniggan, inoeniggan, inoeniggan, to speak gently, as one ashamed or abashed. Paenig, pinaenig, papaenig, ipaenigga, ipaenig, inipaenig, inoipaenig, to cause such to be done.
inum: aum: illoiloa, illoilan, inilloilo, inoilloiloon, to continue to desire any thing long and earnestly. Pailloilo, nom. illoilo.

zh-def: 強褓中孩子蜷曲；在人背後說好話或壞話
ori-def: inummillc, aummillo, illoa, illoan, inilloan. inoilloan, the winding up of a child in swaddling clothes; also to speak behind one's back, either good or ill. Paillo, pinaillo, papaillo, ipailloa, ipaillo, inipaillo, inoipaillo, to cause such to be done,
inummerap, aummerap, erappa, erappan, inerap, inoerappan, same as Tummerap, to lick. Paerap, pi. pa. ipaerappa, ipaerap, inipaerap, inoipaerap, to cause such to be done.
inummichich, aummichich, ichicha, ichichen, inichich, inoichich, to gnaw. Paichich, pinaichich, papaichich, paichicha, ipaichich, inipaichich, inoipaichich, to cause such to be done.

inumietiet, aumietiet, ietita, ietiten, inietiet, inoietiten, to bite off the ends, as of thread, &c. Paietiet, pinaietiet, papaietiet, ipaietita, ipaietiet, inipaietiet, inoipaietiet, to cause such to be done.
inummior, aummior, iorra, iórran, iniorran, inoiorran, to follow, also to agree to. Ummior o ranied o atite, to obey. Payor, pinayor, papayor, ipayorra, ipayor, inipayor, to cause to follow.
inummitto, aummitto, ittoa, ittoan, inittoan, inoittoan, to sing in solo, to sing before any one. Paitto, pi. pa. ipaittoa, ipaitto, inipaitto, inoipaitto, to cause to sing.

inummitip, aummitip, itippa, itippen, or itippaan, initippaan, inoitippen, or inoitippaan, to cut through, to cut off. Paitip, pinaitip, papaitip, ipaitippa, ipaitip, inipaitip, inoipaitip, to cause to be cut off.
inum : aum: ituppa, the sharpness of strong drink.

zh-def: 為了轉植樹或植物把樹挖起來
ori-def: to transplant a tree or plant, and for that purpose to dig it up. Paoal, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 除草；把雜草從田裡拔起來
ori-def: to weed, to root weeds out of a field. Pao-o, transiti.
inummoob, aummoob, oppa, óppen, inoob, ino-oppen, to carry out, to bring to an end, to finish. Paoob, pinaoob, papaoob, ipaoba, ipaoob, inipaoob, inoipaoob, to cause such to be done. Aoob, nom.
inummomo, aummomo, omoa, omoan, ino-omoan, to put on a female head-dress. Paono, pinaono, papaono, ipaonoa, ipaono, inipaono, inoipaono, to cause such to be done. Aomo, nom.
inummoror, aumoror, ororra, ororren, inoror, ino-ororren, to fry out fat. Paoror, pi, pa, ipaororra, ipaoror, inipaoror, inoipaoror, to cause to fry out. Aoror, nom.
to halt, to limp, inummatul, aummotul, otulla, otullen, inotul, inootullen. Paotul, transit.
inumpo, aumpo, uppoa, uppoon, ieupo, inouppoon, to knead with the foot. Pauppo, pinauppo, papauppo, ipauppoa, ipauppo, inipauppo, inoipauppo, to cause such to be done.

zh-def: 用米粉和麵包做的本土蛋糕
ori-def: native cakes of ground rice, bread.
the south. Mat a wannan, mi, ma, southward. Patawannan trans.
ten: written tschien.
fish: written tsi.
a needle: written tsia.

the half or side of any thing; hence people say, zhabûan-anig and ûllûmas, the left and right side. An opposite party, written shabaan, verb. Mashabaan, pashabaan. It is also used as a preposition, against.
grief, from Mazichil.
the breast, milk. From Zinido.
the soul: written tsjes.
small worms generated in food; written tsiga.
length, height. From matsilo:writtentsilo.
a spot or stam. From tsimilak.
a silkworm; silk, either woven or raw.
a flea.

zh-def: 懷疑；出自不信任地做某事
ori-def: zinimianna, tazimianna, zianna, ziannanni, ziniannanni, inoziannanni, to be suspicious, to do any thing from mistrust. Pazianna, pinazianna, papazianna, ipazianna, inipazianna, inoipazianna, to cause such to be done. Written tsimianna, see in T.

zh-def: 從上方把乾淨的部分移除、拿掉〈以讓下面的渣滓不會被攪亂〉
ori-def: zinimichallo, tazimichallo, zichalloa, zichalloon, zinichûllo, inozichalloon, to skin off the clear portion from the top, so that the dregs underneath be not disturbed. Pûzichallo, pi, pa, ipazichûlloa, ipazichallo, inipazichallo, inoipazichallo, to cause such to be done.

zinimichier, tazimichier, zichirra, zichirran, zinichirran, inozichirran, to resemble, to imitate. Pazichier, pi, pa, ipazichirra, ipazichier, inipazichier, inoipazichier, to make any thing like. Written tsinichier, see in T. Pataitach, idem; tatschier, nom. likeness.

zh-def: 把皺的、摺起來的東西弄平滑
ori-def: zinimichzich, tazimichaich, zichzicha, zichzichen, zinichzich, inozichzichen, to smooth any thing that is folded or rumpled. Pazichzich, pi, pa, ipazichzicha, ipazichzich, inipazichzich, inoipazichzich, to cause to be smoothed.

zinimido, tazimido, zidoa, zidoan, zinidoan, inozidoan, the sucking of infants. Pazdido, pinazdido, papazdido, ipazdidoa, ipazdido, inipazdido, inoipazdido, to give suck. Tummis o zinido, to wean : shiem initis o zinidó, a weaned child.

zinimiek, tazimiek, izika, iziek, iniziek, inoiziek, to fillip, to give a fillip: to dip as meat in the sauce. Paziek, pinaziek, papaziek, ipazika, ipaziek, inipaziek, inoipaziek, to cause such to be done. Written tsinyk, nom. tatsyk, see in T.
zinimiesto, inozimiesto, ziestoa, ziestoan, ziniesto, inoziestoan, same tumpa. Paziesto, pi, pa, same pûtûppa.

zinimigoggo, tazimigoggo, zigoggoa, zigoggoan, zinigoggoan, inozigoggoan, to stand on tip toe. Pazigoggo, pinazigoggo, papazigoggo, ipazigoggoa, ipazigoggo, inipazigoggo, inoipazigoggo, to cause such to be done.

zinimikak, tazimikak, zikakka, zikakkan, zinikak, inozikakkan, to open; as zikak o ranied, &c. Pazikak, pi, pa, ipazikakka, ipazikak, inipazikak, inoipazikak, to cause to be opened. Said of the mouth and ear. Written tsimikak, see in T.

zinimilak, tazimilak, zilûkka, zilakkan, and zinilakkan, inozilakkan, to befoul. Pazilak, pinazilak, papazilak, ipazilakka, ipazilak, inipazilak, inoipazilak, to cause such to be done. Written tsimilak, see in T. Nomen Zilab, under tsilak.

zinimimis, tazimimies, zimisa, zimisan, zinimisan, inozimisan, to taste. Pazimies, pinazimies, papazimies, ipazimisa, ipûzimies, inipazimies, inoipazimies, ta cause to taste. Written tsimimis, see in T.
zinimioch, tazimioch, ziocha, ziochen, zinioch, inoziochen, to couple. Pazioch, pinazioch, papazioch, ipaziocha, ipazioch, inipazioch, inoipazioch, to cause such to be done.
zinimipies, tazimipies, zipisa, zipisen, zinipies, inozipisen, to cut. Pazipies, pi, pa, ipazipisa, ipazipies, inipazipies, inoipazipisen, to cause to cut. Written tsimipies, see in T.

zinimipó-o, zipo-oa, zipóan, zinipòan, inozipòan, to fall on one's knees. Pazipo-o, pinazipo-o, papûzipo-o, ipaeipo-oa, ipazipo o, inipazipo-o, inoipûzpo-o, to cause such to be done. Written tsimipo-o.
zinimipoespoes, tazimipoespoes, zipoespoessa, zipoespoessen, zinipoespoes, inozipoespoessen, to pick out crumbs or filaments, Pazipoespoes, &c, to cause such to be done.

zinimipok, tazimipok, zipoka, zipokan, zinipokan, inozipokan, to paint, to write. Pazipok, pinazipok, papazipok, ipazipoka, ipazipok, inipûzipok, inopûzipok, to cause such to be done. Written tsimipok, see in T. Nom. tatsipok, a writing, also the instrument employed. Tatsipokan, and tatsipókayan, a writing place or table.

zinimiries, tazimiries, zirisa, iziries, iniziries, inoiziries, whereto ? zirisan, zinirisan, inozirisan, to hang any thing up. Pûziries, pinaziries, papaziries, ipûzirisa, ipaziries, inipaziries, inoipaziries, to cause such to be done. Written tsimiries, see in T. Tatsiries, a hanging up: tatsiriesan, and tatsiriesayan, the place whereto, as a hook &c.
zinimiro, tazimiro, ziroa, ziroon, ziniro, inoziniroon, to reach. Paziro, pinaziro, papaziro, ipaziroa, ipaziro, inipaziro, inoipaziro, to cause to reach.

zinimirrit, tazimirrit, zjirta, zjirtan, zimirtan, inozjirtan, to hold or lead by a string. Pazjirrit, pinazjirrit, papazjirrit, ipazjirta, ipazjirrit, inipazjirrit, inipazjirrit, to cause such to be done. Written tsimirrit. Nom. tatsjirt, that wherewith we lead, as a string.

zinimisakal, tazimisakal, zisakalla, zisakallan, sinisakallan, inozisakûllan, to squat down. Pazisakal, pinûzisakal, pa. ipûzisakalla, ipûzisakal, inipûzisakal, inoipûzisakal, to cause such to be done. Written tsimisakal, see in T.

zh-def: 透過洞斜瞅；瞄準；直直看過去
ori-def: zinimisi, tazimisi, zisia, zisian, zinisian, inozisian, that which ? zisien, zinisi, inozisien, to leer through a hole, to aim, or look directly. Pazisi, pinazisi, papûzisi, ipûzisia, ipûzisi, inipûzisi, inoipazisi, to cause such to be dene. Written tsimisi, see in T.
zinimisella, tazimisellasella, zellasella, zellasellaan, zinellasellaan, inosellasellaan, to do any thing over again, in order to be sure.
a knife.
the heel. Ziò no chûrrina, a small piece of skin under the ears.
a chicken of the wildfowl.
west. Zipûn a amisûn, northwest. Written tsipûn, see in T. Zipûn a wannan, south-west.
the sun, a day.
a little dog.
a branch: used only of small twigs.
a band on which to hang a gun; a sash.
as tattaisan, a step, stairs.

zh-def: 捲軸；任何捲起來的東西
ori-def: a roller, any thing rolled up.
a step, a stride.
the tress of a woman's hair.
the stalk of rank grass. Baron o arras.
a woman's head-dress.
a small vessel.
the sea.
a bowl.
the areca nut.
armour, preparation to go on a journey.
ashes, lime.
rust.
hearth.
semen.
or Bog, the body.
not yet; ûcho man o micham, I have not yet eaten or drunk.
or Chauge, enough.
a part or share.
a coral chain
the roof of a house
paddy
a calabash. Chachied, a ditto wherewith to scoop out water Tabo, large calabash
a piece, an end. Kattach, bitil bórbor
and addas o rima, the palm of the hand
a stink
a crab
or alam, all kinds of missile weapons, as spears, javelins &c.
he, that, there, but not far. Ai-i, idem
there, but not far
there, thereout
the setting of the sun
a creation, a formation. From Merien
a chair cushion
a small star. Baboan, a large star
the following. Ayor natta, the second
a net for catching wild beasts
ornament
that, in order that
kindness
a month, a child
a whirlwind
firewood
（the last a short） the filaments of roots
the north

zh-def: 李子；李子樹；桃子；桃子樹
ori-def: a plum, a plum tree, also a peach, or peach tree. Amo o ranna, cherry, or a cherry tree, in assouk kareka
the liver
the muscle of the hand
before, previously
when was it?
it was today, said in the evening
yesterday evening
just now, not long ago
first, or before
this morning, early
truly, certainly
yesterday. Anshada somma, yesterday evening
day before yesterday
last night
a long time ago
former days
? forward
what?
pickle
a finger. Sini àpillo, the thumb. Gakotul o rima o sasoot, the fore finger. Babat apillo, the middle finger. Aior shiem apillo, the last finger. Shiem apillo dautatsilien, the little finger
a toe
a measure
a servant, a maid. Ara, a messmate, a fellow, the common gender
a meal, a wallet
level plain country
grass. Arasta, a lump of earth
a rope, a cord, a match
a vat, a bale, a ton

zh-def: 狩獵工具，如弓、箭和魚網
ori-def: hunting implements, as bow, arrow, and fish nets
all kinds of lemons and citron
a place of assembly. Ta, or don o arorro-aijan, the plain or house where people hold meetings
the breast
a fence, a garden
or modaraudau ya idas, full moon
a lump of earth

zh-def: 家具；各種工具、服裝和裝飾品
ori-def: household furniture, all kinds of implements, clothing and ornaments
the neck and the back part of the head. Chauch o arriborribon, the hollow part of the neck
an inmate
great；and oog, small bamboos
a centipede
an armring；also an instrument wherewith to pluck grass
a branch

zh-def: 人或野獸的臀部；肋骨的骨頭。
ori-def: the rump of a man or beast, or the bones of the ribs. Botorro, the stump of a man's body when the head is taken off

zh-def: 一種用於在兩個人之間承載貨物的工具。
ori-def: an instrument for carrying loads between two as a bier. Asaboan o macha, the bier of a dead man.
wares, merchandize
a pig's stye
a certain kind of bamboo
the sides of a house
a seam
a castnet
laziness, idleness
a threshing floor
a sieve；in combination, asi o riba a shirt, strictly speaking the white rim round the neck of a coat
a pole in the middle of a house. Bandon, the two outer supports where the ridge pole rests.
a leg, a thigh: Chaûch o asiel, the hollow part under the foot
the beams of the sun
a handkerchief
great trees. Ieran, small trees. A-tsitsi, small peas
a gift, or present
a village
a field rat, nearly like the mole
a drawing, also a letter
